Quickstart¶

AIM Configuration Directory¶

You will need a directory of YAML that describes your cloud infrastructure.

ToDo: How to create a starting template?

aim-project
    ├── Accounts
    │   └── dev.yaml
    │   └── prod.yaml
    ├── MonitorSets
    │   └── AlarmSets.yaml
    │   └── LogSets.yaml
    ├── NetworkEnvironments
    │   └── my-app.yaml
    ├── Services
    │   └── S3.yaml
    ├── project.yaml

More things¶

You should have a CLI application named aim.
